descriptionlist.description: In order to use, just enable the Animated Colors Respring Logo in Anemone and respring for the changes to take effect.

In order for this respring logo to work properly, the tweak "MakeRespringsGreatAgain" cannot be installed. Having it installed will cause the Animated Colors Respring Logo to not display properly. If you have "MakeRespringsGreatAgain," please uninstall it before installing the Animated Colors Respring Logo.

screenshot.description: This will be the displayed respring animation
